content.html: Today is my last day on the EKS team. I'm heading over to work on a new project that I'm VERY excited about I'll be working on an open source tool I had the idea for and shelved because I couldn't support by myself. No job title change. Just not directly focused on #Kubernetes.
content.value:
Today is my last day on the EKS team. I'm heading over to work on a new project that I'm VERY excited about

I'll be working on an open source tool I had the idea for and shelved because I couldn't support by myself.

No job title change. Just not directly focused on #Kubernetes.
